channel.title: AWS on Mussell Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Mussell Portfolio

item.title: Securing Sensitive Data in Terraform
item.description: Best practices for managing secrets and sensitive data in Terraform configurations. Covers secure credential storage, secret rotation, and integration with cloud provider secret management services.

item.title: AWS Cloud Architecture: Multi-Region High Availability Design
item.description: Designing and implementing a multi-region, highly available cloud architecture on AWS. Covers VPC design, load balancing, database replication, disaster recovery, and cost optimization strategies.
